analyzed: rnam par gnon mdzad thugs rje che //

original: nyid kyi thugs skyong khros pa yis //
analyzed: nyid kyi thugs skyong khros pa yis //

original: ye shes spyan drangs gsang sngags gsungs //

original: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs la 'jug pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol rnam par gnon pa'i de kho na nyid ting nge 'dzin byed pa dang ma bral bas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bar ma chad par rjes su bzla zhing gnod

translated: The BhagavƒÅn, who is inseparable from the samƒÅdhi of the reality of conquering the opponent, enters the body, speech, and mind of all sugatas and recites the great king of secret mantras without interruption.üîΩ

original: pa thams cad bsreg par bya'o //
analyzed: pa thams cad bsreg par bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One, who is never separate from the samƒÅdhi of the reality of conquering the enemy, who is engaged in the body, speech, and mind of all sugatas, should continuously recite the great king of secret mantras and burn all harm.

original: rig pa 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis sngon gyi dam tshig rjes su dran pas 'phags pa nyid snying la 'jug cing yid la snang ba'i rnam pas bgegs la sogs pa thams cad rnam par zlog par byed do //
analyzed: rig pa 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis sngon gyi dam tshig rjes su dran pas 'phags pa nyid snying la 'jug cing yid la snang ba'i rnam pas bgegs la sogs pa thams cad rnam par zlog par byed do //
translated: By merely reciting this awareness, one will remember the former commitments, and the noble ones will enter one‚Äôs heart and appear to the mind, and through this one will be able to avert all obstacles and so forth.

analyzed: sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do //
translated: All obscurations and misdeeds will also be relinquished.

original: ya nga ba dang 'jigs pa gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ya nga ba dang 'jigs pa gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byung ngo //

original: de la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang rtag tu dgongs pa mdzad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang rtag tu dgongs pa mdzad par 'gyur ro //

translated: The one who possesses samadhi, recites the mantra, and is diligent,üîΩWith a flaming sword, the water of the blazing flame,
